Title: MultipointControls
Description: A collection of controls that applied Windows Multipoint Mouse SDK. Windows Multipoint Mouse SDK enable app to have multiple mice interact simultaneously. See more : http://www.microsoft.com/multipointmouse
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A collection of controls that applied Windows Multipoint Mouse SDK. Windows Multipoint Mouse SDK enable app to have multiple mice interact simultaneously. See more : http://www.microsoft.com/multipointmouse

The first version: 05/2010

Related project:

  • Windows Multipoint Mouse SDK. See more: http://www.microsoft.com/multipointmouse

Currently contains:

  • MultipointInkCanvas : a canvas that enable user to draw stroke on
